section.name: Introduction
section.p: This document serves as an advanced user's guide for the CAS-Curator project. The goal of the document is to explore advanced topics such as security setup and changing the look and feel of the CAS-Curator to match your project. For basic topics, such as checking out, building, and installing the base version of the CAS-Curator, as well as performing basic configuration tasks, please see our Basic Guide.
The remainder of this guide is separated into the following sections:
